about_the_game:
Enter a world of femdom and espionage, where lethal, alluring, powerful women are involved in every aspect of your life. The cut-throat ladies are capable of hardcore sex and much more.

SPY THRILLER


As Agent Kris, Agency’s No.1 spy, you’re on the mission to hunt down members of one dangerous crime organization, Syndicate.


Those highly trained female assassins have caused unquantifiable damage domestically and internationally. Global stability is at stake. The boss is furious. Syndicate needs to be taken down.


But things are never simple when it comes to politics. Dark secrets hide behind sweet smiles.

Remember your mission. Remember who you are. Most importantly, enjoy your time with the girls while you can.

LOVE THE DANGER



Don’t you hate it when beautiful yet lethal women are not the main characters in games, movies, or TV shows? Femme fatales, big tit goth girls are too dark for the mainstream audience but just gothic, spicy, and dangerous enough for your taste.




Play Lethal Women to meet the dominatrixes who will hurt you so good and, at the same time, love you so bad.


If dominatrixes are ever too much, you can always choose to avoid femdom sex and spend more time with a sweet angel.

Lethal Women: World of Femdom and Espionage is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel full of deceptions, dominatrixes, fetishes, and sex. Sex scenes range from striptease to non-BDSM vanilla sex to hardcore femdom gangbangs.

content_descriptors.notes:
Lethal Women is a work of fiction that depicts sex, especially female domination, fetish and BDSM, usage of drugs, and violence. It is only suitable for ADULT players.
All characters are over the age of 20 years old. 
Do NOT try anything harmful or illegal in real life.
